title: Roster Variables Fantasy Basketball
question_text: Jordan's starting team roster for his next fantasy basketball game is shown below.  His roster includes information about different variables for each of the players on his fantasy team. Player Position Height Weight Kev SF $6'9''$ $240$ Bry SG $6'6''$ $212$ Tom PG $6'1''$ $180$ Charlie PF $6'6''$ $250$ Willy C $7'1''$ $275$ What specific variables are identified in Jordan's team roster?

choices.text: The 5 5 players:  Kev, Bry, Tom, Charlie and Willy
The 5 5 different positions:  SF, SG, PG, PF, and C
Player Name, Position, Height and Weight
